thread.title: Global Respiratory Care Equipment and Supply Industry - Rep
thread.title_full: Global Respiratory Care Equipment and Supply Industry - Rep

author: Reportlinker
title: Global Respiratory Care Equipment and Supply Industry - Rep
text:
NEW YORK   This report analyzes the worldwide markets for Respiratory Care Equipment and Supplies in US$ Thousand by the following Product Segments: Spirometers, Other Pulmonary Function Testing (PFT) Equipment, Sleep Apnea Diagnostic Devices, Ventilators, Humidifiers, Nebulizers, PAP (positive airway pressure) Devices, Oxygen Equipment, Manual Resuscitators, and Masks, Circuits & Disposables. The report provides separate comprehensive analytics for the US, Canada , Japan , Europe , Asia-Pacific , The Middle East & Africa , and Latin America . Annual estimates and forecasts are provided for the period 2014 through 2020. Also, a seven-year historic analysis is provided for these markets. Market data and analytics are derived from primary and secondary research. Company profiles are primarily based on public domain information including company URLs. The report profiles 158 companies including many key and niche players such as - 

Allied Healthcare Products, Inc.
Bio-Med Devices, Inc.
CareFusion Corp.
CAIRE, Inc.
Compumedics Ltd.

Read the full report: http://www.reportlinker.com/p03329759-summary/view-report.html 

I. INTRODUCTION, METHODOLOGY & PRODUCT DEFINITIONS

Study Reliability and Reporting Limitations I-1 Disclaimers I-2 Data Interpretation & Reporting Level I-2 Quantitative Techniques & Analytics I-3 Product Definitions and Scope of Study I-3 Spirometers I-4 Other Pulmonary Function Testing (PFT) Equipment I-4 Sleep Apnea Diagnostic Devices I-4 Ventilators I-4 Humidifiers I-4 Nebulizers I-4 PAP (Positive Air Pressure) Devices I-5 Oxygen Equipment I-5 Manual Resuscitators I-5 Masks, Circuits & Disposables I-5
